rooms.description: An open area that includes a welcoming entrance, with space for family gatherings. Designed with eco-friendly materials and ample natural lighting.
The kitchen is integrated with the dining area, featuring energy-efficient appliances, water-saving fixtures, and ventilation that harnesses natural airflow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor facing the east to harness early morning sunlight, designed with ample storage and energy-efficient windows.

A guest bedroom located adjacent to the master bedroom, offering a quiet retreat. The design considers Vastu principles by ensuring clear natural lighting and proper alignment with the northeast direction.
A dedicated library space with eco-friendly shelving and soft ambient lighting, promoting a serene reading environment while considering energy conservation.
Includes laundry room, storage, and water facilities. This area is planned to use sustainable materials and optimized for efficient energy consumption.

openings.description: Energy-efficient door with proper insulation in accordance with eco-friendly standards.
Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation while preserving privacy. Windows are designed to align with Vastu principles ensuring the east-facing entry of sunlight.

additional_features.description: Integrated within the ground floor, located at the rear of the farmhouse for easy access. Designed with sustainable materials and energy-efficient lighting.
Eco-friendly swimming pool area constructed with a natural filtration system and designed to blend with the surrounding landscape.
